To determine LOD in a given past geologic epoch following steps have to be taken:

body:
Set up the velocity of recession expression so as to obtain 3.7cm/y recession in the present time.
  2.Set up the numerical integration of the reciprocal of the Velocity of Recession and spatially intagrate it from a given lunar orbit to the present lunar orbit of 3.884^8m.
Through several iterations make the integrand converge to the past geologic epoch time magnitude.This gives the desired lunar orbit which existed in the past geologic epoch.

Substitute this desired lunar orbi in LOD expression in hours.
  5.We have obtained the LOD in the given past geologic epoch.t
